title: Independence National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park      Â            History and Culture   Be intrigued by the history of Independence Hall, the story of the Liberty Bell, and more.        Photos and Multimedia   Listen to the sound of the Liberty Bell, and find links to photos and videos.              Education   Take advantage of field trip information, lesson plans, and professional development opportunites.        Kids and Youth   Enjoy some family fun - kids can try on a uniform, collect trading cards, and become a junior ranger.
